mapper.select: select PLACE_SERIAL,PARTNER_SERIAL, PLACE_NAME, PLACE_LOCATION, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, STATE, LOCAL_CODE,place_tel from place

select p.PLACE_SERIAL ,p.PARTNER_SERIAL,p.PLACE_NAME, p.PLACE_LOCATION, p.LATITUDE, p.LONGITUDE, p.STATE, p.LOCAL_CODE,p.place_tel,max(ph.sysFile) sysFile from place p, place_photo ph
where p.PLACE_SERIAL = ph.PLACE_SERIAL and partner_serial is not null
group by p.PLACE_SERIAL,p.PARTNER_SERIAL, p.PLACE_NAME, p.PLACE_LOCATION, p.LATITUDE, p.LONGITUDE, p.STATE, p.LOCAL_CODE,p.place_tel

select p.PLACE_SERIAL ,p.PARTNER_SERIAL,p.PLACE_NAME, p.PLACE_LOCATION, p.LATITUDE, p.LONGITUDE, p.STATE,p.wi_fi,p.PARKING,p.BREAKFAST, p.LOCAL_CODE,p.place_tel,max(ph.sysFile) sysFile
from place p,PLACE_PHOTO ph
where local_code=#{local_code} and PARTNER_SERIAL is not null and p.PLACE_SERIAL=ph.PLACE_SERIAL
group by p.PLACE_SERIAL,p.PARTNER_SERIAL, p.PLACE_NAME, p.PLACE_LOCATION, p.LATITUDE, p.LONGITUDE,p.STATE,p.wi_fi,p.PARKING,p.BREAKFAST, p.LOCAL_CODE,p.place_tel
select PLACE_SERIAL,PARTNER_SERIAL, PLACE_NAME, PLACE_LOCATION, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, STATE, LOCAL_CODE,place_tel from place where local_code=#{local_code}

select p.PLACE_SERIAL, r.ROOMS_SERIAL,r.rooms_name,r.PEOPLE,r.PRICE,r.NO_SMOKE,r.OCEAN_VIEW,r.CITY_VIEW,r.MT_VIEW,r.PEOPLE from place p,rooms r where p.place_serial=r.PLACE_SERIAL and p.PLACE_SERIAL=#{place_serial}
select PLACE_SERIAL,PARTNER_SERIAL, PLACE_NAME, PLACE_LOCATION,LATITUDE, LONGITUDE,STATE, LOCAL_CODE,place_tel from place where PLACE_SERIAL=#{place_serial}

select m.member_photo,m.nickName, r.review_serial,r.PLACE_SERIAL,r.reputation,r.REVIEW_TITLE,r.REVIEW_CONTENT,r.VISIT_DATE,r.REVIEW_DATE, count(like_id) likecount from review r left outer join membership m on m.member_id=r.member_id left outer join REVIEW_LIKE l on r.REVIEW_SERIAL=l.review_serial where r.PLACE_SERIAL =#{place_serial}
group by m.member_photo,m.nickName, r.review_serial,r.PLACE_SERIAL,r.reputation,r.REVIEW_TITLE,r.REVIEW_CONTENT,r.VISIT_DATE,r.REVIEW_DATE
